name: Casino Caravan Collection
description:
Casino Caravan Collection is a remake of our first ever game, made before 1CC Games was founded, as a tribute to London's Casino Arcade (RIP). It was originally released in 2011, and is now available to play in your browser for free!

There's also a standalone version for Windows and Mac OS X with added controller support and extra customization options. Be sure to check our Itch page for more great games!


How to Play

Use the Arrow Keys to move and Space to shoot. Destroy enemies to get points and coins. Collecting a coin will add 1 second to the timer and missing a coin will take away 5 seconds from the timer. If you get hit by an enemy bullet you will lose 1 life block. If you lose all your life blocks or run out of time, it's Game Over!

Note: scores will be reset in the browser version if you close the tab or window the game is in, so take a screenshot before leaving if you get a high score and want to keep a record!
